attributes.action: Make available local facilities to the people that actually pay for them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are a number of local facilites such as swimming pools, local goverment office's, leisure facilities and museums funded by taxpayers. 
Unfortuantly many of these facilities are only available monday-friday. It is unfair and frustrating that its the benefit claimers whom dont work that have unlimited access during these periods whilst the rest of us work to pay for them. I propose these facilites are availabe on weekends for those that work and pay for them in the first place.
Public services need to adapt to our changing lifestyle and working habits.
